body.p: To create a portable distribution of that you can use from a USB stick, install normally and then copy the install directory to the USB drive. The .desktop files created by the Linux installer will not work because the installation path is hard coded.

If you installed using the all platforms archive, a copy of Java is not included on your USB stick. To ensure that will run even on systems without the right version of Java installed:
Go to http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html, download and unpack/install Linux JRE.
Place the JRE in the [OXYGEN_DIR] directory, as a directory named jre.
